price: Yaa ummata kiyya! Ani (adabbii) guyyaa wal waamiinsaan isin irratti sodaadha.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum yawma al-tanādi
